Swing Stage & Suspended Platform Rental for Africa & Europe

Swing Stage rental and suspended platform systems for high-rise construction and facade maintenance across Africa and Europe. We offer ZLP800 and ZLP630 series packages with CE & TSE certified SWP compliance, installation, inspections, and on-call support.

Temporary suspended access solutions

From electric cradle setups to temporary suspended scaffold compliance, we design platform lengths, motorized hoists, wire rope lines, and tie-ins around your facade and safety requirements.

International shipping for suspended cradle systems to Africa (Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya) and Europe (Germany, France).

Get Rental Quote

Rental Packages Built for High-Rise Work

Designed for construction and exterior maintenance teams, our rentals focus on fast deployment, certified systems, and dependable support across Africa and Europe.

How Rental Works

1

Project Review

Share site details and scope so we can recommend the right platform configuration.

2

Quote & Logistics

We prepare pricing, export documentation, and an installation schedule.

3

Delivery & Setup

Our team completes delivery, installation, and on-site safety checks.

4

Ongoing Support

During the rental term, we provide maintenance, inspections, and technical support.

What's Included in Your Rental

Safety Certified

CE & TSE certified equipment with inspection records before dispatch

Installation

On-site rigging, setup, and crew guidance by our team

24/7 Support

Emergency response and spare parts coordination when needed

Consultation

Load planning, tie-in advice, and export documentation support

Each rental kit includes counterweights, galvanized steel or aluminum platforms, wire rope lifelines, motorized hoists, and safety lock (parachute lock) assemblies.

Technical Specifications for Modular Platforms

Typical configurations for SWP rentals, temporary suspended scaffold compliance, and facade access solutions across diverse project types.

Platform / SystemRated LoadPlatform LengthDrive & SafetyTypical Use
ZLP800 Suspended PlatformUp to 800 kgModular lengths by projectMotorized hoists with wire rope and safety/parachute locksHigh-rise construction and facade work
Modular Suspended PlatformProject-basedCustom modular spansSWP-compliant safety lock systems with wire rope setsFacade access for complex structures
Temporary Suspended Scaffold (TSS)Site-specificConfigured per siteCertified suspension, counterweights, and guardrail setsExterior maintenance and retrofit programs

Specifications vary by configuration and regional compliance requirements.

Flexible Rental Terms

Every project is different, so we offer rental terms that match your schedule. From short-term access to multi-month programs, we build packages around your timeline.

Our pricing is transparent with clear deliverables. We can provide:

  • Daily, weekly, and monthly rental options
  • Long-term rental discounts
  • Bundle pricing for multiple systems
  • Flexible payment schedules
  • Delivery coordination within service regions
Request Custom Quote

Suspended Platform Rental FAQ

What is the monthly cost of suspended platform rental?

Monthly pricing depends on platform length, load rating, and whether you select ZLP800 or ZLP630 swing stage rental packages. We quote based on project duration, installation scope, and shipping destination.

Do you provide ZLP800 rental for African projects?

Yes. We provide ZLP800 rental systems with export-ready documentation and on-site support for projects in Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya, and other African markets.

What safety certifications do your rental scaffolds have?

Our rental scaffolds meet CE and TSE requirements and are inspected before dispatch. Each system includes documented safety locks (parachute lock), wire rope assemblies, and compliant guardrail sets.
